title: Pretty Little Thing kick off '20% off everything' flash sale
text:

With winter finally settling in, it might be time to refresh your wardrobe with some cosy clothing pieces and accessories.

Popular online fashion retailer Pretty Little Thing are treating customers to a 20% off sale, so you can stock up on new season items for less.

Shoppers can redeem the special offer on PrettyLittleThing.com for one day only on October 30th using the code GET20.

The online retailer recently launched its 'Night Fever' party wear edit, which features a whole lot of glitzy and glam pieces that are ideal for the upcoming Christmas parties.

Or if you're shopping for Halloween outfits, there are plenty of spooky beauty items and fancy dress outfits available on the website.

You'll need to shop soon, though, as the deal won't be around for long.

For those who are regular Pretty Little Thing shoppers, it might be worth signing up for unlimited next day delivery for £5.99.

Here are some of our top picks from the Pretty Little Thing website.

The timeless aviator is a must for fighting off the chill in winter.

Get the look in this PLT offering in black faux leather fabric with fur lining, pocket detailing and an oversized fit.

£70 or £56 with the GET20 code

The snake print is staying put, which means you can expect to see it everywhere this season.

We love these sassy knee-high boots have a comfortable 3.5-inch heel, making them perfect for dancing the night away.

£40 or £32 with the GET20 code

Stay cosy and chic in this pastel-hued beanie hat with a furry pom-pom detail.

£8 or £6.40 with the GET20 code

When it comes to party wear, nothing quite beats a sequin dress - and we can't get enough of this silver option from Pretty Little Thing's latest edit.

£45 or £36 with the GET20 code

Neutral tones are a must in any woman's wardrobe and PLT has countless pieces to help you embrace the trend.

With long sleeves and an oversized fit, this oversized stone jumper is sure to keep you warm when the temperatures plummet.

£18 or £14.40 with the GET20 code

If you're looking for more fashion offers, ASOS currently has 20% off everything with a discount code in its Halloween flash sale.
description: Shoppers can save on new season items from Pretty Little Thing in time for the party season
